current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to
		  provide for the increased purchase of Kosher and Halal food and to modify the
		  labeling of the commodities list under the emergency food assistance program to
		  enable Kosher and Halal food bank operators to identify which commodities to
		  obtain from local food banks.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and
			 Forestry

short-title.#text:
Halal and Kosher Food Act of
			 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

header.#text:
Purchase of
			 Halal and Kosher food for emergency food assistance program

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: ) is amended by adding at the end the following:

shall
				finalize and implement a plan—

text.#text:
As soon as
				practicable after the date of enactment of this subsection, the

to increase the purchase of Kosher and
				Halal food from food manufacturers with a Kosher or Halal certification to
				carry out the program established under this Act if the Kosher and Halal food
				purchased is cost neutral as compared to food that is not from food
				manufacturers with a Kosher or Halal certification; and

to modify the labeling of the commodities
				list used to carry out the program in a manner that enables Kosher and Halal
				food bank operators to identify which commodities to obtain from local food
				banks.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S811 IS: Halal and Kosher Food Act of 2013
